title: Metalloenzyme-inspired approach to the design and applications of phosphatase-mimetic nanozymes. Bridging the inorganic and organic worlds.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00144C, Perspective
Pavel Janos, Pavel Jano≈°
Nanozymes were introduced approximately 15 years ago as inorganic materials capable of mimicking the catalytic abilities of natural (protein-based) enzymes. While the catalytic efficiency of nanozymes typically does not match...
